meanings.definition: A medical condition in which an organ or tissue protrudes through a weak spot in the surrounding muscle or connective tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that herniae can occur when an organ pushes through a weak area in the body.
meanings.sent2: After the surgery, the patient had to be careful to avoid herniae.
meanings.sent3: The herniae decided to take a vacation from the body and went sightseeing in the abdomen.
meanings.sent4: The herniae were like uninvited guests crashing through the muscle wall.
meanings.sent5: The image of herniae peeking through the muscle wall was unsettling.
